name: Levis
body:
### Welcome to alevis' Pages.
Here you will find random thoughts and some documentation of projects I'm working on. 
I've stumbled into a lot of very interesting projects here on github and I'm discovering more. 
I'm especially interested in nlp and machine learning projects. 

### What are you working on?
I'm currently working on a quote system app using the flaskr framework, sqlite3 for data storage and javascript/jquery with html/css. Can't say anything else beyond that except that I'm also using bootstrap and fontawesome. I'm also working on another flaskr app , mulyrica which actually will use nlp packages (written in python) and javascript/jquery. I'm developing my own API to use with the app.
### 
### About me.
Nothing to say here.

### Contact
Write to me 0xc06cd103938bf72a
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
